name: Breakfast at Gina's
description:
Embark on the quest to find Gina and her diner – the toastiest diner with the best coffee and hot pancakes in all the land. 

The 8-bit game begins as the player finds themselves on a path in a forest thicket. Explore the world of Breakfast at Gina's and unravel the clues to find the mysterious Gina and her diner.
